fs.xml
Interface XMLConfigurable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Config, PolyglotStringTable
public interface XMLConfigurable

Defines a type to be XML - configurable, i.e. it is able to store to and read from an org.dom4j.Node its configuration. Different XMLConfigurables should distinguish themselves from each other by declaring unique Type IDs. If a configuration is stored, it usually will be contained in a node bearing this ID as a name.

Author:
Simon Hampe
